import React, {useState} from 'react'; //import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import './LeadStatus.css'; import { TextField } from "@material-ui/core"; import { DatePickerComponent, TimePickerComponent } from "@syncfusion/ej2-react-calendars"; import {DateRangePickerComponent} from "@syncfusion/ej2-react-calendars/src/daterangepicker/daterangepicker.component"; import {DateTimePickerComponent} from "@syncfusion/ej2-react-calendars/src/datetimepicker/datetimepicker.component"; const LeadStatus =() => { // const [value, setValue] = useState(new Date()); const [agent , setAgent ] = useState({ firstname: " ", lastname: " ", email: " ", phonenumber: " ", interestedcourse: " ", collagename: " ", status: " ", date:" ", time: " ", notes: " " }); let name, value; const handleInputs = (e) => { name = e.target.name; value = e.target.value; console.log(name, value); setAgent({...agent, [name]: value}); } const PostData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const { firstname, lastname, email, phonenumber, interestedcourse, collegename, status, date, time, notes } = agent; const res = await fetch("/leadstatus", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify({ firstname, lastname, email, phonenumber, interestedcourse, collegename, status, date, time, notes }) }); const data = await res.json(); if(data.status === 422 || !data ){ window.alert("Registration failed"); } else { window.alert("Registration successful"); } } return(

Need to call {/*add status dynamically {status} from backend*/}



) } export default LeadStatus;
